EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_11/12/13Launch_Q413.OSS Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Private PaaS built for Spring Apps - Special Announcement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, On November 4, 2013, Ben Kepes at Forbes said “Cloud Foundry is on an absolute tear <http://www.forbes.com/sites/benkepes/2013/11/04/breaking-sorry-rackspace-et-al-ubuntu-to-offer-openstack-hosted-cloudfoundry-based-paas/>…” As the commercial entity behind Spring, we are making every effort to ensure that Spring apps will continue to take advantage of the latest innovations in infrastructure. We invite you to join us for the rest of the story on November 12th which will include a product announcement and remarks from:
- Paul Maritz, CEO - Scott Yara, SVP of Products - James Watters, Head of Product for Cloud Foundry
Register now <gopivotal.com/theplatform> for the webcast event: The Platform for Building Great Software
